wikitext.*:
'''Queen''' ([[Quenya|Q.]] ''tári'', [[Noldorin|N.]] ''rhien'') can refer to:
==Arda==
*[[Queen of Gondor]], a title of the Queens of [[Gondor]]
**Queen [[Berúthiel]], a famous Queen of Gondor
*[[Queen of Númenor]], a title of the spouse of any [[King of Númenor]].
**[[Ruling Queen of Númenor]], one of the three queens that ruled Númenor in the capacity of a King.

*Queen of the Valar (Q. ''Valatári''), one of the seven [[Valier]].
**[[Varda#Names and epithets|Queen of the Stars or Star-queen, Q. ''Elentári'', S. ''Elbereth'']], titles of [[Varda]].

==Real-world==
*[[Margrethe II of Denmark]], the queen regnant of Denmark and illustrator of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

{{disambig}}
